messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Dragon Pokémon are sacred beings...
That’s what my master taught me.And now I’ll prove it to you!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Not good enough!
We’re still not strong enough!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
It’s not good enough for a Pokémon
to just be tough.It’s not good enough for a Trainer
to just work hard.Both have to grow together!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
This time we’ll get it right!Marvel at the exquisite combination of
my Pokémon and myself!
